itemListElement.name: Guardian Fall Protection Roofing Kit
itemListElement.description: All-in-one OSHA-compliant fall protection kit built for roofing contractors tackling steep pitches.

itemListElement.name: Werner Roofing Safety System
itemListElement.description: A premium fall protection setup trusted by pros and major contractors alike.

itemListElement.name: Malta Dynamics Warthog Roofing Kit
itemListElement.description: Tough, field-tested gear with a military-grade harness — built for harsh jobsite conditions.

itemListElement.name: 3M DBI-SALA Roofer’s Compliance Kit
itemListElement.description: Trusted brand with advanced safety features for high-risk residential and commercial roofing.

itemListElement.name: SafeWaze Roofer's Basic Fall Kit
itemListElement.description: Affordable and compact — great for quick jobs or starter crews.

mainEntity.name: Which fall protection kit is best for a solo roofer on a tight budget?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Guardian Fall Protection Roofing Kit offers reliable OSHA-compliant gear at a budget-friendly price, ideal for solo roofers or small crews.
